https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Don't You Be Afraid was recorded in the middle of a heat wave in Los Angeles in 2010. Mike Muratore's style has earned him the moniker "The Serial Killer of Comedy". Find out why by watching this comedy special. Don't You Be Afraid
